comments.content:
Also, on a digital revival, an article from a few years ago:

[http://www.economist.com/news/christmas-specials/21591793-legendary-type...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415000436/http:/www.economist.com/news/christmas-specials/21591793-legendary-typeface-gets-second-life-fight-over-doves "http://www.economist.com/news/christmas-specials/21591793-legendary-typeface-gets-second-life-fight-over-doves")
Oh wow. I suspect that corrosion may make these historical artifacts less useful as references than the books printed with them, but this would still be wonderful news even so.

Cobden-Sanderson in his grave be like

“oh sh\*t. somebody dig me out.”
